title.native: 道産子ギャルはなまらめんこい

description:
Snowflakes aren’t the only things dropping in Hokkaido—so are jaws, thanks to the super adorable gals who are turning the icy north into a hotbed of fashion and fun. Brace yourself for a winter storm of laughs, love, and killer outfits as these gals prove that being cute is an all-season affair. Here, frostbite meets fashionista!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: สาวแกลเมืองเหนือน่าฮักขนาด

tags.name: Gyaru
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who has a distinct American-emulated fashion style, such as tanned skin, bleached hair, and excessive makeup. Also known as gal.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Snowscape
tags.description: Prominently or partially set in a snowy environment.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

title.native: 道産子ギャルはなまらめんこい
道産子ギャルはなまらめんこい

node.description:
__[Website](http://asaka1007.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/asakaofficial)__

__Birthplace:__ Aichi Prefecture, Japan
__Hobbies & Special Skills:__ Watching Anime, Karaoke, Cosplay, Sleeping, English

__Asaka__ is a Japanese vocalist and translator.

Website | Twitter Introduction Masayoshi Ooishi is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer, arranger and guitarist. He is currently a lead vocalist and guitarist for the band Sound Schedule, which is a three-piece J-pop/rock/jazz band. He is also a part of the duo [OxT](https://anilist.co/staff/127401/OxT) (Ooishi x Tom-H@ck), with Oshima Tomohiro. Biography Since making his major debut as a vocalist and guitarist for the band Sound Schedule in 2001, he has left numerous works as a musician. His outstanding voice, which has revealed itself to be capable of touching the hearts of many, worldwide, and while having his performance evaluated by the people, as a part of a new band at the time, he got to appear on music-themed programs on TV, and on numerous unusual music stations, while also participating in festivals nationwide. In 2008, he made his solo debut as "Masayoshi Ooishi". His way of playing the acoustic guitar was said to be a masterpiece of its own, and as a solo artist to debut with that as a reputation, it made it all the more interesting for him. There are various ways to describe him as a musician, some call him a "hand magician", or a "one-person amusement park", some even say it's like watching a magic trick. Not only does he perform live at the country's floorboard, he also performs on the internet on sites such as YouTube and Nico Nico Douga, where he attracts lots of attention from all generations alike, but he's a lot more popular with the younger generation.
__Aiko Yamagami__ is a Japanese color designer and digital painter.

[Profile (F.M.F)](http://www.fmf-music.com/members/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/eba_cadode) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/eba_1987_/)

Eba is a Japanese music producer, guitarist, composer, arranger and member of pop unit [cadode](https://twitter.com/cadode_). He is also affiliated with F.M.F Corporation.

_Note: Not to be confused with the vocalist and lyricist with the same name [Hirokazu Ebata aka Eba](https://anilist.co/staff/161178)_
